title: Agentforce at Scale
summary: From 2.6M internal conversations to 63% autonomous resolution, now serving 18,500 enterprise customers with 3B automated workflows monthly

content.whatItIs: Salesforce has achieved what may be the largest enterprise deployment of agentic AI, with Agentforce serving 18,500 enterprise customers running more than 3 billion automated workflows monthly.
howItWorks: Internal validation: deployed on help.salesforce.com, handled 2.6 million conversations, now resolves 63% of questions autonomously
Customer satisfaction scores roughly match human agents
Enterprise results: Reddit (46% case deflection, 84% reduction in resolution times), Adecco (51% conversations outside working hours)
Engine: Anticipating $2M savings, CSAT improved from 3.7 to 4.3
WEF deployment (January 2026): 'EVA' proactive concierge for 3,000+ leaders at Davos
content.coreInsight: Scale proves the model. Deploy agentic AI internally first (2.6M conversations), prove autonomous resolution rates (63%), then expand to enterprise customers. The progression: internal dogfooding, measurable metrics, industry-specific case studies, then platform scale.
content.keyMetrics: 18,500 enterprise customers (up from 12,500). 3B automated workflows monthly. Agentic product revenue: $540M ARR.
